speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m good, but why are you calling me?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm reaching out regarding your outstanding balance with ABC Credit. It's important we discuss this.

speaker: Customer
text: I've asked you to put my number on a do not call list already.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the confusion. Let me take care of that for you right now.

speaker: Customer
text: Please do that. I don’t want to hear from you again.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely. I've marked your number as do not call, and you won't receive any further calls.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! If you need anything else, feel free to reach out.
